title: Electoral Process (Local Government By Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2024
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 149
Gazette dated Friday, 2nd February, 2024
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 15 of 2024
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2024
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the
Electoral Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order,
2024.
2. A candidate for election as a Councillor in a district and Date and
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the Time of
nomination
returning officer on Thursday, 1st February, 2024 between 0900
for election
hours and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Friday, 2nd Campaign
February, 2024 at 1400 hours and close at 1800 hours on Thursday, Period
29th February, 2024.
4. (1) A poll for the election of a Councilor in a district and Election
ward set out in the schedule shall take place on Friday, 1st March, date and
time of poll
2024 between 0600 hours and 1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district or ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101 Lusaka. Price K4.00 each.
